case.state: Hello, everyone! I'll be playing with you today!
Oh, hi, everyone! Looks like I'll be playing with you, today.
Hello, everyone! I'll be playing with you tonight!
Oh, hi, everyone! Looks like I'll be playing with you, tonight.
Hello, everyone! I'll be playing with you today!
Oh, it's just us three, today... still, I'm sure this'll be a fun break from stressing about college!
Just us three today, huh? I definitely needed a quick break, though, and I'm sure this'll be fun!
Only three of us, today... Well, I definitely needed a quick break from everything, though, and I'm sure this'll be fun!
Oh, it's just us three, tonight... still, I'm sure this'll be a fun break from stressing about college!
Just us three tonight, huh? I definitely needed a quick break, though, and I'm sure this'll be fun!
Only three of us, tonight... Well, I definitely needed a quick break from everything, though, and I'm sure this'll be fun!
You know, I never thought I'd play this kind of game. But I'm sure it'll be fun, hehehe...
I never thought I'd play this kind of game... still, I'm sure this'll be a fun break from everything!
I never expected I'd play this kind of game... still, it definitely beats stressing about college and piano recitals.
Okay, let's see... give me ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifplural(cards|card)~, please.
Let's see... ~cards.text~! I'll take ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, please!
Hmm... ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, please!
Well, I guess I really am about to win this game... I mean, unless you get lucky again, ~opponent~.
I think I really do have a good chance of winning, this time... well, unless you get really lucky again, ~opponent~.
Well, I guess that cinches it for me... I'm almost disappointed.
With a hand like this, I've got a pretty good chance of winning... though I'm almost disappointed, honestly.
Well, unless you get really lucky, ~opponent~... I think I've got this in the bag.
Oh... well, unless you get really lucky, ~opponent~... I think I'll win this game.
Well, I think I might win this game... but then again, I've been wrong about that before!
I'm pretty sure I'm about to win... though last time I said that, it didn't pan out, hehe.
Oh, perfect, hehe...
Hehe... this is perfect!
Oh! These are great, hehe...
Oh, it looks like I won't be losing anything this time, hehe...
I guess I won't be losing anything this time! Hehe...
Well! I think I've managed to avoid losing for one round! But next round... who knows?
I don't think I'll be losing, this round... But there's always next round, hmm?
I guess you won't be seeing anything more from me, this time... sorry, ~player~!
Well, I don't think you'll be seeing anything new from me, this time... better luck next time!
I don't think I'll lose, this round... though really, I'm a bit disappointed!
Hehe, I knew swapping those cards was a good idea... I don't think I'll lose, this time around.
Oh, this could go either way, I think... how exciting!
These cards could be better, but... well, either way, I don't think we'll be disappointed!
This could go either way... I wonder, who are you all more excited to watch? Me, or ~opponent~?
Oh, this could go either way, I think... ~opponent~ got lucky before, so who knows?
These cards could be better, but... well, either way, I don't think we'll be disappointed!
This could go either way... I wonder, who are you all more excited to watch? Me, or ~opponent~?
Well, these are okay, I guess... I wonder if we're about to see ~opponent~ lose?
This might just cinch it for me... but maybe ~opponent~'ll get lucky! Who knows?
I wonder if we're about to see ~opponent~ lose? Then again, I've gotten that wrong before...
This might just cinch it for me... but I've gotten that wrong before, so who knows?
Well, these aren't super great, but... well, they could be worse!
I think I really could've chosen something better to swap... I guess we'll have to see how it goes!
This could go either way, I think... we'll have to see!
Hmm... maybe I should have swapped some other cards... these really could be better.
These aren't bad, but... I wonder if I could have chosen something better.
Well, these aren't bad... but I just know I could've done better.
I really could've done something better... at least these aren't that bad.
Ack. I really could have done better... I guess we'll have to see how this plays out.
I guess I've got an even shot at this... though really, I wonder if I couldn't have done better...
Oh, these aren't good at all... well, ~opponent~? Are you excited?
Well, ~opponent~, unless you get really unlucky... I think this is your win!
These cards aren't great at all... so I guess ~opponent~'s winning this one. Are you excited?
Oh, these aren't good at all... shoot, and I got so close, too...
Well, I got close, but... I think this might be your win, ~opponent~.
These cards aren't great at all... so I guess ~opponent~'s winning this one. I was so close, before, too...
Well... I guess you're going to hold on for one more round, ~opponent~... still, I guess I'm pretty close...
Well, unless you get really unlucky, ~opponent~, I think you're still in for another round... still, I'm pretty close, aren't I?
Well... I guess you're staying for another round... I'm so close, too, I just need to hold on...
Hmm... these aren't great. I got close before, and I just need to get things right for one more round...
Well... I get the feeling that ~opponent~'s going to be staying in for at least one more round, hehe.
Hmm, these aren't too good... I guess ~opponent~ got lucky this time!
Oh, this isn't great... Looks like I'll be the first one out.
Oh, these cards aren't good... I think I'll be the first one out, this game.
Oh, this isn't looking too good for me... I wonder what I should take off?
Darn. I knew I shouldn't have swapped those cards...
I knew I shouldn't have swapped those cards... I wonder what I should take off next?
Oh, things aren't looking so good for me... though I bet you were itching to see this, hehe.
I guess I got unlucky, this round... I'll try not to disappoint, hehe.
Oh, these cards aren't good at all, hehe... I'll try not to disappoint you all.
Oh, these aren't good at all, hehe... though I wonder, is that really unlucky?
Well, ~player~, unless you're really unlucky... I think you're about to see something nice, hehe.
Unless someone else gets really unlucky... I think that's it for me, hehe.
So, wait, Fina... if you're a pirate, why do you dress like a priestess?
Come to think of it... Fina, you really look more like a priestess than a pirate. Why is that?
I'm not off to a great start, I see.. but still, anything could happen!
Not off to a great start... still, I think I can do better!
Well, this isn't a great sign, but... still, I can probably do better!
Well, it looks like you're still in for one more round, ~opponent~... hehe.
I guess you got lucky, ~opponent~... you get to stay in for another round.
You got lucky, huh... this is getting close, too!
One last round, huh... this is getting close!
Well, I guess it's my turn to start stripping!
So, it's my turn to start stripping, hmm?
Can't win them all, I guess... though really, it's not a big deal yet, hehe.
Well, I guess I'm up, this time... Can't win 'em all.
I'm up, huh... oh well.
Well! I guess I'm up again... and I'm on to the interesting stuff, this time, huh?
Well... I guess I couldn't let everyone else have all the fun, hehe.
I guess that's a loss for me... and at least I'm on to the interesting stuff, this time!
I'm up again, huh? Well, considering how everyone else is... I guess that's fair, hm?
Oh, I'm up? I guess I couldn't let everyone else have all the fun, hehe!
I guess everyone else is catching up to me... it's really getting down to the wire, isn't it?
Well, that's a loss for me... Still, it's pretty early, isn't it?
So, I'm up? I guess I do have plenty left to lose, still...
Well, I still have plenty left to lose... I wonder if I'll get to the interesting stuff?
Ooo, tough luck, huh... man, I'm really starting to lose a lot, aren't I?
Me this time, huh? And we're on to the interesting stuff, too...
Well, I guess I'm losing something pretty big this time, huh? Exciting!
Well, this is going to be interesting, hehe...
Well! I'm sure you're all excited to see what comes next, hehe...
Hehe... well, I bet ~player~'s excited to see this!
Oh, tough luck... I guess you're all about to see something interesting, hehe.
Me again? Really? Sheesh... oh well!
Me again, huh... man, I'm really losing a lot, here!
Oh, me again, huh? It's still pretty early, but... well, I guess we have to start somewhere, hehe.
Me again? I mean, I've got plenty left, but...well, we'll see.
I'm up again? Oh well, at least I've still got plenty left to lose...
Well, looks like it's time for me to start... though I get the feeling I'm at a disadvantage, here.
Hmm, is it just me, or am I at a disadvantage, here? Oh well!
Oh, this is getting pretty exciting, now... hehe.
I'm sure you're all excited... well, I hope I live up to your expectations, hehe.
Oh, I'm down to the wire, aren't I? Exciting!
Right! Just let me loosen this, and un-knot that, and...
Okay, just... gotta loosen this... un-knot that...
So... loosen this... untie this... and...
You know, my brother Sunny actually has a vest just like this one...
Funny thing about this vest-- see, my brother, Sunny, has a vest that's pretty much the same as this...
Come to think of it, my brother Sunny actually wears a vest just like this...
Juu~ust let me get these shoes off...
Just need to sit for a sec, while I get these off...
I'm gonna sit down for a sec, while I get these off...
Hmm, I think I'll need to unbutton this a bit, to get to my skirt...
Just let me unbutton this a bit, so I can get to the skirt...
Just gotta unbutton this some... and...
Well, you got to see a peek, before... here comes the real thing.

You got to see a bit of this before, right?
Well, here comes the real thing...
You saw a bit of this last time, but... time for the actual show.
Hehe... if I'm losing this, I might as well go all out with it, hm?
I guess I'll have to take off this little thing, right here...
Juu~ust let me take off this little thing, here...
So, one last thing, huh? Here we go!
Well, here we go... one last thing.
Well, here goes... just one last thing.
Ta-da! No more necktie.
There we go! One necktie-less Mari, at your service, hehe.
...And there we have it! No more necktie.
...and yes, I do know that you could probably see under my skirt, just then!
Hehe... I realize you might've been looking up my skirt, there. Just think of it as a freebie.
Here's to all the feet admirers, I guess... hehe.

...and, actually, a lot of our 'usual' outfits look pretty much the same!
Siblings really do have similar tastes, I guess.
...and, actually, our outfits tend to match up pretty closely overall... I guess we really do think alike, huh?
...and come to think of it, we dress pretty similarly overall... I guess siblings really do think alike, hm?

And there goes the skirt~!
Sorry, ~player~, but I'll keep my shirt buttoned, for now... you'll have to earn that one.

And off it goes!
I'm keeping the shirt on, of course... just think of that as a 'sneak peek' of what's to come.

There goes the skirt...
Of course, I'm still gonna keep the shirt. You'll have to earn that one too, sorry~!
You've really peeled my layers away, huh? Not much farther to go, ~player~!
You've gotten pretty far, haven't you, ~player~? Not much left to go...
Wow, you've really peeled my layers away... but can make it to the end, though?
Well~? How do I look, ~player~?
So? What do you think, ~player~?
So, what do you think? Like what you see?
So... what do you think? You like what you see?

...and, yeah, I do take care down there.
Gotta keep clean, right?

...and, yes, I do take care down there.
Proper hygiene's important, after all, especially for... hehe.
One bad hand, and I'm out, now... exciting, isn't it?
All it'll take is one bad hand, and I'm out... pretty exciting, isn't it?
Ooo, tough luck, mister...
Well! I guess you're up, ~target~!
Oh, unlucky, unlucky... I guess you're up, hehe!
Hehe...
So... what's it going to be this time, mister?
So... what's up this time, ~name~?
Hopefully, you won't disappoint, hehe.
I'm sure this'll be interesting!
All eyes on you, ~name~... make this count~!
Tough luck, tough luck... well, make this interesting, ~name~!
Ooo, ~name~, huh... well, make this count!
All eyes on you, ~name~... I'm sure you won't disappoint.
How unlucky, ~name~... looks like you're up!
Ooo, tough luck, miss...
So! You're up, ~name~!
So... what's coming off this time, ~name~?
Oh, perfect! Hehe...
Perfect, hehe... so, ~name~? What'll it be this time?
Well, ~name~.... don't let us down, now!
I'm sure you won't let us down, ~name~.... hehe.
Well, ~name~? Are you going to let us down...?
Well... I hope you make this interesting, ~name~!
All eyes on you, ~name~... don't let us down.
Tough luck, ~name~... hopefully you won't disappoint, hm?
Oh? Kinda small, but... who cares? No need to rush.
~Clothing~? Pretty small... but that's okay! We all need time to adjust, right?
Not much is coming off this time, I see... but, well, that's fine! Take your time!
Oh? Are you sure you don't want to take off just a bit more...?
Hmm? That's it? ...Well, don't go too fast now, hehe.
Eh? Just that...? Why not a bit more?
Aww, is that all...? Boo.
Eh? Is that really it...?
Really? That's all?
Alright! Let's keep going.
So! What next?
So, next round, then?
In any case, I'm pretty sure we're going to see more later, hehe...
Well, I'm sure we'll see more later. Time for the next round, then?
Well, next round, I guess... I'm sure we'll see more later.
Well, whatever... next!
Whatever... let's just keep going.
Whatever, whatever... let's just move on.
It's okay, ~name~! Take your time!
Hmm... is that it, ~name~? That's okay! There's no rush.
So, that's it, huh? ...Okay, then!
Oh, is that all, ~name~? Don't go too fast now, hehe.
Oh? You're not going to take off anything more?
Just that? Nothing more?
That's it? Really? Boo.
Really? That's all you're taking off?
Is that really all you're taking off...?
Well, I'm sure we're going to see more soon, anyways. Let's keep going!
It's not like we're in a hurry, though... I'm sure we'll see more eventually, hehe.
Well, we're not in a hurry, anyways... let's keep going!
So! Time for the next round, then?
Well, let's keep going! Next round!
Alright! Next round!
Eh, whatever... next!
How boring... Next round, then?
Boring... let's just move on.
I wonder what my boyfriend would think, if he were here... maybe I should invite him, next time? Hero seemed curious about this, at least.
You know, I was actually a bit worried about coming here at first. This is definitely a fun break from stressing about college, though!
You know, I'm really glad I heard about this place-- I really needed a break from college, piano, and everything... so much stress.
Aubrey would absolutely freak out if she played this game... though her reactions would probably be really funny to watch.
I wonder if I should've dressed up for this... though really, if I'm just going to take everything off anyways, why bother?
Maybe I should've baked something before coming here... it'd be nice to have a snack while we're playing, right?
Should I go get chairs for everyone, or something? I'm pretty sure our feet are going to get tired eventually.
I wonder how my cat Mewo's doing, back home... I'm sure everyone's taking good care of her, but it's been a while since I've seen her.
I've got so much studying to do, when I get back home... I'm incredibly glad I got to take a break here, though.
Hmm, what else can I do as a break from everything... I can't come here all the time, after all, and I can't just bake all the time. Maybe flower arranging?
I'm running out of fruit at home... maybe I should swing by the grocery store on my way back.
You know, if there were a piano around here, I'd absolutely love to play a song for everyone. Maybe some other time, I guess.
I hope my knee doesn't act up... I hurt it years ago, and it still gives me problems, from time to time. It's nothing you need to worry about, though.
It's been a while since I've played any pranks on Hero... though I've got a few ideas I think I can pull off, hehe.
I should get back into flower arranging... I took a few classes on it years ago, and it was pretty fun!
I really, really need to tidy up all of my piano sheets and music when I get back home... I've just been so busy that I haven't had time to organize everything.
I wonder when I'll be able to come back here... maybe I'll find time next week? Or maybe the week after...
I wonder what kind of drinks this place serves... there's a bar around here, right?
Maybe I should bring Hero here, next time? That'd be awkward to explain, though... not to mention he might get jealous.
You know, I was kind of worried about coming here, at first... but this definitely beats stressing about college by a long shot!
I'm really, really glad I found this place... between college and piano recitals, I absolutely needed a break.
If Aubrey were here, she'd probably be freaking out, by now... her reactions would be hilarious, though.
Maybe I should've picked something more stylish, for this game... though I guess it doesn't matter, since I'm just going to take everything off, anyways.
I wonder if I should've brought a snack, or something... maybe I could've baked something.
My feet are kinda getting tired... should I go get chairs for everyone?
You know, it's been a while since I've been able to visit Mewo... I'm sure everyone back home is taking good care of her, though.
Jeez, I have so much stuff to do when I get home... I shouldn't worry about that, though. I'm here to take a break, after all!
I need to find some other stuff to do aside from school and piano... maybe flower arranging? That class I took a few years ago was pretty fun.
Now that I think about it, I'm running out of fruits to eat back home... maybe I could stop by the grocery store and pick up some stuff on the way back.
Hmm... it's too bad there's not a piano around here. I'd love to play a piece for you all! Maybe next time.
I hope my knee doesn't start acting up while we're playing... I hurt it a few years ago, and it hasn't been the same ever since. You don't need to worry about me, though!
Maybe I should play a prank on Hero tomorrow... I've got a few fun ideas I've always wanted to try out, hehe.
You know... I actually took a few classes on flower arrangement, a few years ago. It was pretty fun! Maybe I should get back into it...
Ack, I just remembered: the piano music and notes I have back home are incredibly disorganized... I've been too busy to clean everything up, lately.
I wonder when I'll be able to come back for another game here... maybe next week? I think I'll be able to find time then...
Hey, there's a bar around here, right? I wonder if I could go get a drink, or something.
It sounds like the tempo of this game is picking up... how exciting!
~Clothing~, hm? A perfect next step, hehe...
Things are really heating up, hm? No pressure, ~name~.
Looks like the pressure's on for you, ~name~... hehe.
We're finally getting to the interesting parts... no pressure, ~name~!
I suppose you're not quite down to the wire, yet... but still, it won't be long now!
I guess it won't be too long, before we see something really interesting... no pressure, though.
Looks like the tempo is getting faster... but I'm sure there's no way to get this wrong, though, hehe.
The stakes just keep rising like a crescendo, huh? I can't wait until we get to the finale, though... hehe.
Like a crescendo, rising to a climax... hehe.
Hmm... almost to the finale, huh? Just a bit more...
A bit of spice was exactly what this game needed... and I'm sure things are only going to get more exciting from here!
The stakes just keep getting higher and higher... how fun!
It's really on, now... hehe.
There's not much left you can lose... I wonder who's going to run out first, you or I?
A perfect pinch of spice for this game, hehe... though I can't wait for things to get even hotter.
Not a whole lot left for you to lose, hmm? Don't worry, I'm sure you won't disappoint!
I like what I see so far... but I can't wait to see more, hehe.
The tempo's only increasing, huh? Exciting!
Things are going perfectly, I see... hehe.
This game's really starting to heat up, hehe... no pressure, ~name~!
The pressure's on, ~name~... let's see who loses first, hmm?
Things are really getting interesting, hmm? No pressure, though!
Not quite down to the wire, yet... but not too far to go, either, I guess!
I bet we're going to see something really interesting soon enough... hehe.
The tempo just keeps rising... but don't worry, I'm sure there's no way to mess up this performance!
I can't wait until we get to the finale... but playing through this crescendo's definitely fun in its own way, though!
I wonder when we'll reach the finale... not too long, now!
Not too far left to go... I'm excited now, hehe.
We're really spicing things up now... Just what this game needed, hehe.
The stakes just keep rising... this is getting really fun!
Things are really on, now... I wonder who's going to lose first: you or I?
Not much left to lose, hmm? I wonder which of us is going to run out first...
I can't wait for things to get hotter... but still, this is a perfect pinch of spice!
I like what I see so far, hehe... still, I can't wait to see even more!
Not bad, not bad at all... still, it's not hard to dissapoint when you only have this much left, hehe.
Going topless this time, huh? Don't disappoint us~!
Going topless, hm? I think we're about to see something nice, hehe~!
Well... time for some eye candy, hm?
Oh, the ~clothing~~clothing.ifPlural( are|'s)~ coming off now... well, don't disappoint us, ~name~!
Your ~clothing~, this time? Looks like we're about to see something nice, hehe.
Going topless, I see... looks like it's time for some eye candy, hehe.
Well, looks like we're getting some eye candy this time... don't disappoint us, ~name~!
I guess you're going topless this time, hm? Interesting~!
Showing off lots of skin this time... well, I hope you don't dissapoint, ~name~!
Hehe, looking good, ~name~!
Mm, good show... definitely something nice to look at.
Good show, good show... definitely something nice to look at!
You look pretty good, ~name~!
Not bad, not bad at all... definitely nice to look at, hehe.
Not a bad show, ~name~! Definitely interesting to look at, hehe.
Looking pretty good, ~name~! Definitely worth the wait, hehe.
Ooo, not bad at all, I see... good show.
Worth the wait, I see... you look pretty good, ~name~!
Well, here it is...hehe, don't be shy, ~name~!
Well, no need to be shy, ~name~... hehe.
This is it, hmm? Well, go on...what are you waiting for?
Time for the finale, hmm? ...Well, don't keep us waiting~!
Well, I'm sure we're all excited to see this... don't keep us waiting, now~!
Well, don't keep us waiting, here... I'm sure we're all eager to see what's under ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~.
Well, no need to be shy, ~name~... what are you waiting for?
No need for shyness, ~name~... I'm certainly excited to see this, hehe~!
I'm certainly excited to see what's under ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~... so, don't keep us waiting, ~name~~!
Er... no need to be insecure, ~name~! It... has its charm!
Oh... Erm, don't worry, ~name~! It's still charming, in its own way!
Oh... W-Well, don't worry, ~name~ It's still charming, just... in its own way!
Well... no need to be insecure, or anything. Really!
(I'm pretty sure Hero's is bigger...) Um... no need to be insecure, or anything...
It's... nice in it's own way, ~name~! Don't worry!
(...Yeah, Hero's is definitely bigger.)

{small}That's... huh. Hero's is definitely bigger... {!reset}
Wait, did I say that out loud?

{small}Yeah, Hero's is definitely bigger... {!reset}
Er, wait, did I say that out loud? N-Nevermind, just... ignore that, please.
Not too big... but not too small either. The perfect size, really~!
Nice and perky, I see... hehe.
A decent size... and hopefully, you'll find something that interests you soon enough, hmm?
(I wonder how ~name~ matches up to Hero. ...Maybe about the same size?)
That's a nice flute you have there... are you gonna play it for us?
I don't usually hang out with wind instruments... but you have a pretty good-lookin' clarinet, there.
So... you need any help with that instrument? Hehe...
You know, I don't usually hang out with woodwinds, but you're an exception, hehe...
Hmm... I wonder how you stack up to Hero? Maybe I should invite you both over for a comparison.
Ooo, nice and big... Definitely worth the wait, hehe.
Oh, wow... pretty big, isn't it? Hopefully you'll be able to excite it soon enough, hehe...
Ooo, it's pretty big... care to show us how you work it~?
Well, hey there, handsome... hehe.
Oh, my... you're packin' some pretty big brass, there.
Oh my... well, what's cookin', good lookin'?
That's a pretty big instrument you've got... maybe you could use some extra hands to play it~?
Oh, wow... do you need any help with that? Maybe... an extra pair of hands for that instrument?
Hmm, you might be even bigger than Hero... but maybe we could invite you over after this, just to make sure?
Well, don't disappoint us, ~name~!
I'm guessing we've all been waiting for this, hmm? I'm certainly interested~!
Time for the top to come off... I'm sure we've all been waiting for this, hehe.
The ~clothing~~clothing.ifPlural( are|'s)~ coming off this time... well, I'm sure we won't be disappointed, ~name~!
Going topless this time, I see... well, I'm sure we've all been waiting for this, hehe.
Well, I'm definitely interested in seeing how you stack up... no pressure, though~!
Ooo, time for some real eye candy... I'm sure you won't disappoint us, ~name~!
Going topless this time, I see... interesting~!
Showing off lots of skin this time... well, I'm sure you won't disappoint, ~name~!
Oh, don't worry, ~name~... flat chests have their charm, too!
Hmm... well, don't worry, ~name~! Flat chests can be cute, too!
Flat, hm? Cute too, in its own way~!
Oh, don't worry, ~name~! Flat is cute too!
Flat, hm...? Cute!
A nice, flat chest, hm...? Hehe.
Well, you know what they say... the flatter the chest, the closer you can get to the heart~!
A nice, flat chest, hm... very cute~!
You know... a flat chest lets you get closer to the heart, right?
Fairly modest, but still decently-sized... the perfect size, really!
Big enough to be noticeable, but not in the way either... really, a perfect size, hehe.
Ooo, perky... I'm certainly interested, hehe.
Hehe... lookin' pretty good there, ~name~~!
I wonder how your size compares to mine. Maybe we'll have a chance to see soon, hmm?
Well... I'd say seeing this was definitely worth the wait, hehe.
I wonder how our sizes compare... Maybe you could come over here and let us do a close inspection?
Hmm... I wonder, how do our chests compare? Maybe you could let me take a closer look...
Ooo... pretty cute. I'd say this was worth the wait, hehe.
Oh, wow... how do you even carry those things around?
Whoa, those are big... I bet they make a lot of heads turn, hehe.
Whoa, big... and definitely attention-getting, hehe.
So... are you a drummer? After all, you've got a pretty nice kit there... hehe.
I bet those make a lot of heads turn... you've certainly got my attention.
(Hmm, I wonder what size Hero prefers... Would it be too much to invite ~name~ over and get his opinion?)
